channel.title: Help me choose a server to use?
channel.description: Ok so theres ALOT of servers, and its hard to choose, so I need a little help. And don't say search, I've been looking at servers for the past few days. Anyways, heres what im looking for. Not Fully PK(Meaning theres actually quests and things to do besides PK) Not too easy to gain xp/money(I don't want players lvl 100 in a few minutes) Lots of features such as godswar and etc. Customizable. Please recommend a good server to use. Thanks ~Endrien

item.title: Help me choose a server to use?
item.dc:creator: @endrien endrien
item.description:
@endrien wrote:

Any other suggestions as well? I don’t want a server users will be bored with in 5 mins. and I wish Chassyscape had bandos(The actual boss) :(, too bad theres no 508 chassy

Read full topic
item.source: Help me choose a server to use?

item.title: Help me choose a server to use?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

The only downside of Chassyscape is there is a shop glitch. People can only buy in quantities of 1 at a time. So I would suggest putting in some command codes like ::buyskill or ::mantas etc… to make up for items people may buy in mass quantities.=/

Read full topic

Berky-Scape, By Berky.
[/quote] Is berky supposed to have any training areas or shops? Or is it mainly a base? Cause I log in and theres nothing really I can do on a non-admin account(testing with non admin first)
I am looking for something with some premade content like shops etc.[/quote]I meant bulky-scape. And no I am not going to waste my time reading after the berky sentence.

item.title: Help me choose a server to use?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:13, topic:276287”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=364867.msg2769477#msg2769477 date=1241034892]

[quote author=Girona link=topic=364867.msg2769476#msg2769476 date=1241034848]

Chassyscape is also very easy to code.
[/quote]Actually they are all the same, as they all use Java
[/quote]Agreed, if you don’t know where to put your coding you wont get far in private server making.

Although they use Java, they can still be very different. A member who is used to programming 317’s will struggle with 508’s at their first attempt at a 508, due to different classes, variables, etc.[/quote]Yeah, not me though, when I started 508… I was like yeah ok I see where this is going.

Read full topic

Chassyscape is also very easy to code.
[/quote]Actually they are all the same, as they all use Java
[/quote]Agreed, if you don’t know where to put your coding you wont get far in private server making.[/quote]
Although they use Java, they can still be very different. A member who is used to programming 317’s will struggle with 508’s at their first attempt at a 508, due to different classes, variables, etc.

item.title: Help me choose a server to use?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Well if you want godwars and stuff try using the Chassyscape base. As for the not fully PK and not fast exp rates, just go into the files and change them. =]

To make it not fully PK, make some things like bosses or a skilling area for people to play at.

Chassyscape is also very easy to code.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me choose a server to use?

item.title: Help me choose a server to use?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

Well, I have nothing agaisnt TestScape, a bit stable, nice to work with for beginners, but I will give a list of what I think would be good.

#1 TestScape
#2 PimpScape
#3 Project-Czar

TestScape
Stable, nice to work with, good for beginners, also beside nice to work with, it’s easy to work with too.

PimpScape
Well, this one here does have alot of useless junk but it will be easy to clear, and you got a nice stable server to work with

Project-Czar
Hmm, this one is real messy, alot of unwanted crap, but it is mostly used by all of the MoparScape members.
Just clean it up a bit, fix some stuff, it will be ok. It might take a while to clean up though, I will suggest some good tutorials on clearing out some lag in PM if you would like.

# Origional topic I posted this on #

Read full topic
